radiographic_examinations.findings: Stage 3 fibrosis, no steatohepatitis or other types of liver injury.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Progression to decompensated cirrhosis 17 months after primary HCV infection.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Grade 2 inflammation and stage 2 fibrosis, with concomitant grade 2 steatohepatitis.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Mild to moderate hepatosplenomegaly noted on CT scan 19 months after diagnosis.
Progressed to decompensated liver disease with massive ascites.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Stage 3 fibrosis, grade 2 inflammation, and grade 1 steatohepatitis.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Repeat liver biopsy one year later showed stage 4 fibrosis with no change in steatohepatitis.
